DOC.brief_summary: This study consist 2 phase . Phase 1 one day crossover study see effect study product smoker 's desire smoke , measure change score questionnaire give time . Phase 2 two-week extension , subject self-administer study product visit study site assessment desire smoke collection sample evaluation smoking-related biomarkers .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Dietary Supplement Anatabloc Reducing Daily Smokers ' Urge Smoke
